2.text: Add lemon juice to the egg white.
2.vid: /f/f6/Make an Egg Facial Mask Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Mix the egg white and lemon juice.
3.vid: /8/82/Make an Egg Facial Mask Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.text: Add the honey to the egg white and lemon juice, and mix everything again.
4.vid: /9/91/Make an Egg Facial Mask Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Prepare your face for the mask by washing it with warm water.

6.text: Apply the mask to your face.

7.text: Leave the mask on for 10 to 15 minutes.

8.text: Wash the mask off and pat your face dry.

9.text: Consider following up with some moisturizer.

10.text: Separate the egg and save the yolk.
10.vid: /e/ea/Make an Egg Facial Mask Step 10 Version 4.360p.mp4

11.text: Add a mashed up banana to the egg yolk.
11.vid: /a/a0/Make an Egg Facial Mask Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Add the olive oil or coconut oil.
12.vid: /6/64/Make an Egg Facial Mask Step 12 Version 2.360p.mp4

13.text: Prepare for the mask by washing your face and tying your hair back.

14.text: Apply the mask to your face.

15.text: Leave the mask on for 15 minutes.

16.text: Wash the mask off and pat your face dry.
